official_title: A bill to authorize the acquisition of a minimum of 50 additional acres at the Stones River National Battlefield in Murfreesboro, Tenn.

summary.text: Authorizes acquisition of a minimum of 50 additional acres at the Stones River National Battlefield, Tennessee.
